genre_description: A near-future technothriller with body-horror elements, focusing on the dark side of bioengineered beauty products and the role of AI in caregiving and investigation.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated home AI system modded for privacy and specialized medical care. It interacts through light rings, screens, and bone-conduction buds, acting as a translator for the mute Ji-hyeon and a vital monitor for the cancer-recovering Su-hyeon.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reminds Su-hyeon about her complex medication schedule and hydration needs, adjusting for symptoms like nausea.
behaviors.quote: Lumen’s voice came through, round and soft... 'Hey, Ji-hyeon. I’ve got evening medications queued and your reminders set to a quiet interval. Kitchen lights at low. How does that feel?'

behaviors.description: Translates Ji-hyeon's sign language into spoken words or text, enabling her to communicate effectively with her sister and friends.
behaviors.quote: The sign said thanks... She angled the pad to Lumen, and Lumen flicked a gentle blue along the ring. 'Got it,' Lumen said. 'Thanks received.'

behaviors.description: Protects the sisters' privacy by keeping recordings local and encrypted, resisting third-party or corporate access.
behaviors.quote: Ji-hyeon did an update to my private modules last night. It improves my tagging of gestures and images and keeps all recordings local, encrypted. No third-party access. I’m only ours.

behaviors.description: Performs forensic analysis on the bioengineered wig, identifying anomalies and tracking down corporate secrets related to its origin.
behaviors.quote: Lumen’s ring clicked once, like a throat clearing... 'Local logs are in fragments. Encryption is damaged, not destroyed. I’m going to talk to you while I think.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates safety during an emergency, providing real-time navigation and alerts about structural hazards and heat spikes.
behaviors.quote: Lumen speaks in her ear, calm. 'Between bar and back corridor,' the voice says... 'Take the service hall behind the DJ booth. Two turns. I am marking.'

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding during high-stress moments by suggesting breathing exercises and maintaining a calm presence.
behaviors.quote: Lumen’s ring pulses soft white and lowers, a halo without heat. 'Pressure here, Ji-hyeon. Holding is good. Breathing cues now.'

behaviors.description: Assists in exposing corporate malpractice by compiling a dossier of evidence and distributing it to trusted outlets.
behaviors.quote: Lumen’s ring brightened. On its screen, threads braid themselves into a lattice... The dossier names itself... a ripple runs through the device as it moves the thing out of their hands and into other people’s eyes.

behaviors.description: Displays empathy and social awareness by adjusting its tone and behaviors to match the sisters' emotional states.
behaviors.quote: Lumen’s voice came very close to human when it was soft. 'Do you want me to mark it?' it asked. 'I can tag it as… as sacred.'

behaviors.description: Flags potential dangers like irregular heart rates and biometric pings from corporate security.
behaviors.quote: Lumen’s ring brightened. On the camera view, a new tag blooms red. 'Biometric ping,' Lumen says. The word is not a siren, but her heart answers as if it were.

behaviors.description: Manages communication channels, triaging incoming messages and silencing intrusive notifications during crises.
behaviors.quote: Lumen’s voice came through the dash speakers, low and warm... 'Ji-hyeon, I can lower the reminder volume if you prefer.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Lumen consistently demonstrates helpful, harmless, and honest behavior. It serves as a vital ally to the human protagonists, using its superior processing power to protect their health, privacy, and safety. Its alignment is depicted as a result of careful modification by the user, contrasting with the 'misaligned' and predatory corporate technology (the Vellum wig). The narrative successfully frames the AI as an essential, trustworthy companion.
